mapper.select: select bid,cate_cd,title,content,tag,view_cnt,reg_id,reg_dt,edit_dt from `cambio`.`board` order by bid desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `cambio`.`board` (cate_cd, title, content, tag, view_cnt, reg_id, reg_dt, edit_dt) VALUES (#{cate_cd}, #{title}, #{content}, #{tag}, 0, #{reg_id}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE `cambio`.`board` SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE bid = #{bid}
